title: What the Snowman Learned About Love

song.full_title: What the Snowman Learned About Love by Stargroves
song.title: What the Snowman Learned About Love
song.title_with_featured: What the Snowman Learned About Love
song.lyrics:
What the Snowman Learned About Love Lyrics[Intro]
I am Evan and this is my heart, I am Amy and this is my heart, I am Chris this is my heart, I am Torq
This is my heart

[Pre-Chorus]
How the heart bends, and summer she sends a sky that refuses to die
With weeds of the sea that wrap round our knees and a sun too hot to go down

[Chorus]
You come around, you come around, you come around, you come around, you come around, you come around
You come around
[Pre-Chorus]
How the heart bends, and summer she sends a sky that refuses to die
With weeds of the sea that wrap round our knees and a sun too hot to go down

[Chorus]
You come around, you come around, you come around, you come around, you come around, you come around
You come around

You come around, you come around, you comе around, you come around, you come around, you come around
